title: Islands in the sky
creator_credit: Klaus Jaritz, Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: Shows the summer wildflowers in Kosciusko National Park. Discusses adaptation of the plants to the hostile environment and includes an alpine herb field, ferns and bogs.
creator_credit_for_label: Klaus Jaritz, Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
